text: I'm thrilled to share that my latest art exhibition was a success! I've always been passionate about digital illustration and it's great to see my work being appreciated.

Thanks for the kind words! My inspiration comes from everyday life and the digital era we live in. I like to explore the relationship between technology and privacy in my work. The incident last year where my email was hacked and sensitive personal data was leaked has deeply affected me and influenced my art. It's a constant reminder of the importance of digital security.
Absolutely, I've been using XYZ design software for the past 3 years. It's been instrumental in my workflow, especially the vector tools and layer management.
